ATTR_UNIX.Com: sudo -iu cognos tbm cluster update-service &ENV bluemartini-website

XHEADER.Title: Restart Bluemartini Website from STQA envrionment
Restart Bluemartini Website from PREV environment
Restart Bluemartini Website from PROD environment
The Pub will be executed at 4:00am Every Wednesday
